body_html:
I had the same issue (Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS) after git clone (--recurse-submodules) and bazel build:

ERROR: no such package '@protobuf//src/google/protobuf': Could not find handler for bind rule //external:protobuf.

It can be fixed in the same way by "bazel clean"
body_text:
I had the same issue (Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS) after git clone (--recurse-submodules) and bazel build:
ERROR: no such package '@protobuf//src/google/protobuf': Could not find handler for bind rule //external:protobuf.
It can be fixed in the same way by "bazel clean"
body:
I had the same issue (Ubuntu 16.04.2 LTS) after git clone (--recurse-submodules) and bazel build:

ERROR: no such package '@protobuf//src/google/protobuf': Could not find handler for bind rule //external:protobuf.

It can be fixed in the same way by "bazel clean"
